channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M2
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M2

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M2 westbound between J7 and J6 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M2 westbound between junctions J7 and J6, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M2 westbound within J5 | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M2 westbound at junction J5, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks closing two lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M2 eastbound between J1 and J2 | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M2 eastbound between junctions J1 and J2, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M2 J3 westbound access | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M2 westbound entry slip at junction J3 will be closed due to roadworks, from 8 pm on 5 October 2011 to 6 am on 6 October 2011.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M2 J3 westbound exit | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M2 westbound exit slip at junction J3 will be closed due to roadworks, from 8 pm on 5 October 2011 to 6 am on 6 October 2011.
